name: Kitty Finder
description:
Kitty Finder was made for the Godot Wild Jam 24 around the theme of "Family".

In this game you play as a mother cat who is looking for her kittens!

Controls are wasd for movement, space for jump, e to pick up/drop kittens and enter for accept.

Source: https://github.com/A-Sandwich/family-godot-wild-jam-24
